message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for $20000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $17000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $18500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $18250. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $18000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I've made several concessions already, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $18100. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $18000. I'm willing to meet you at this price. Can we finalize the deal at $18000?
I've already made several concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any further. I'm willing to meet you at $18050. This is my final offer. What do you think?
